Text: As mentioned in the write-up, at least one reputable source (part of the parent company that owns the film) says it's 1968, which is why I put both years in the title line.

Thank you for the great film! 
I love Sandy Dennis.

Man, who doesn't love Sandy Dennis?  :)  She's a gorgeous girl, one of the reasons I first found this movie back in the 1980s.  Hope you like it!
